competitors.name: Adidas
competitors.market_position: Leading global sportswear brand; Nike’s biggest competitor; shares significant market presence in India and globally; experiencing some growth challenges in China but remains a top contender.

competitors.name: Anta
competitors.market_position: Chinese sportswear brand rapidly growing and benefiting from nationalistic trends (‘Guochao’) in China; posing significant competition to Nike’s market share especially in China and expanding globally.

competitors.name: Li-Ning
competitors.market_position: Another prominent Chinese sportswear brand growing rapidly by capitalizing on ‘Guochao’ trends; strong competitor to Nike in China with global expansion ambitions.

competitors.name: Salomon
competitors.market_position: Acquired by Anta, known for outdoor and sportswear segments; part of the growing Chinese sportswear ecosystem challenging Nike’s dominance in the region.

competitors.name: Asics
competitors.market_position: Global sportswear and footwear brand competing in running and athletic footwear segments; recognized competitor to Nike in the athletic shoes market.

competitors.name: Puma
competitors.market_position: International athletic and casual footwear and apparel brand; actively competing for market share in India and globally among younger consumers.

competitors.name: Under Armour
competitors.market_position: US-based sports apparel and footwear brand; competitor focusing on performancewear and targeting similar age demographics as Nike.

competitors.name: Fila
competitors.market_position: Sportswear brand competing primarily in lifestyle and athleisure; recognized player in Asian markets including India.

competitors.name: New Balance
competitors.market_position: Global athletic footwear and apparel brand; competitor in running shoes and lifestyle segments targeting Gen Z consumers.

competitors.name: Skechers
competitors.market_position: Global footwear brand competing in casual and athletic footwear; increasingly targeting younger consumers including Gen Z.

competitors.name: Lululemon
competitors.market_position: Premium athletic apparel brand focused on athleisure and performancewear; more focused on apparel than footwear, but considered a competitor in overall sportswear space.

competitors.name: Athletica
competitors.market_position: Athletic apparel brand competing primarily in activewear; smaller scale competitor relative to Nike.

competitors.name: VF Corporation
competitors.market_position: Parent company of multiple apparel brands (including The North Face, Vans); competitor in broader apparel and lifestyle markets impacting Nike’s share.
